name: Resident evil 7 Banned Footage Vol.2
description:
This newly unearthed footage exposes further secrets from the dark past of the Baker family.<br/>
<br/>
- 21: Take part in a twisted card game where the stakes are your life.<br/>
- Daughters: Experience the events that unfolded on the night it all started, when the downfall of the Bakers was set in motion.<br/>
Includes the extra bonus content Jack's 55th Birthday.
